Text: So the author is an anti-liberal Murkan radio host? That pretty much ID's him as yet another lying Koch-sponsored propagandist who makes a good living shilling for a corporate-fascist feudal realm. Just another Nazi.

I shouldn't have said Nazi. Instead, Borst is tied to the John Birch Society (via the Schlafflys) and has worked for decades for the Archdiocese of St Louis. So he's likely been involved in the coverups of priestly pederasty. What better way to distract attention from one's own conspiracies and crimes than by spreading disinfo? Oh yeah, a real sweetheart...
